snippet.title: Streets of Rogue 2 Classes Overview Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Get a taste of the dozes of classes available in this crazy, immersive RPG sandbox set in a vast randomly generated open world. Fight, sneak, hack, farm, build, steal, or talk your way to power as you try to topple a corrupt president in countless possible ways – solo or with friends. Early access commences 22nd Oct.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165810

#convergenceshow #indiegame
